website_summaries.verdict: The Monster SoundStage S1 offers a huge, party-ready sound in a small box coupled with exhaustive connectivity, but subtle it is not.
pros: The Monster SoundStage S1 is a compact wireless speaker with plenty of bass and treble
It offers a great number of connectivity options including Bluetooth, Wi-Fi and optical, plus compatibility with Spotify, Internet radio and all manner of digital files
Bass output is deep and controlled, and the soundstage is surprisingly wide for the speaker's size
cons: Its recessed midrange and hyped bass/treble sound makes it a poor choice for folk and rock music
Its competitors sound more laid back and easier to listen to long term
High-resolution files can be prone to dropouts, and the app required for control can be finicky to set up and use

customer_reviews.title: Does not last more than one year
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 4 of these units, I was very please with the sound quality especially of the Medium size speaker. The reason I am giving a one star is that all of these speakers stopped working within a years time. Terrible track record when it comes to product quality!
customer_reviews.author: John Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Crap Product!
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst speaker that I ever spent $400 on. First of all it was built very cheap and you can tell it was manufactured by Chinese workers. It was dead on arrival and did not even turn on. I've heard that these speakers are the same issues all around and people have spent big money on them only to fail in less than a year! Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Melodic Soul Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Item Listing Is Incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: Seller is listing this speaker as a Monster Soundstage bluetooth medium (S3), and is actually selling a Monster Soundstage mini (S2), via Monster's description of there discontinued Monster Soundstage Bluetooth Speaker line. I informed seller of this and seller will not acknowledge this fact. Also I recieved a dirty speaker. Again to seller, Monster Soundstage Speaker line is as follows. (S1) Small, (S2) Mini, (S3) Medium.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T. McLean

customer_reviews.title: Very short life before they just won't turn on anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Well really loved this speaker and its sound, but the thing about these speakers..(I have two other s3's, is that they don't last long. This one lasted less than one year before the red light......just won't power on. and now one of the my S3 just did the same thing after about one year as well. Great sound, but there is something up with the lack of longevity and lack of customer service. (they will only help you if buy from best buy ). Disposable speakers? no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING I  will not recommend this!!!..
customer_reviews.text: Sucks its hard to open the power on dont buy this or else you gonna repent and your wasting your money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: George  Valeroso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: purchased as present for my son, he loves them has 3 now
customer_reviews.author: james edwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound....it's m'y second one, one in the kitchen and one in the living room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The crossover points and internal amplifier of this speaker are designed perfect. Music sounds like 'producers' intend it to sou
customer_reviews.text: Crisp, clear, sound. The crossover points and internal amplifier of this speaker are designed perfect. Music sounds like 'producers' intend it to sound and how they hear it in their music studios....the feint sounds in the background of the songs are clean and clear. This results in the ultimate listening experience. This speakerbox can be used instead of a soundbar....since it has a digital optical input. The monster clarity HD model one speakers are much louder then this. But this gets pretty loud.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wendrick

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Application quit every 5 minutes. To get back connection you have to reinstall app. Impossible to use. How could Monster release such a raw product on the market. Now understand why there is no even single review on this product. Because nobody want it !!!
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: I was very upset the product did not work, ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very upset the product did not work, I call Monster they instructed me send product back to sender. I was an I am still very unhappy 😞😞😞
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE, WRONG INFORMATION
customer_reviews.text: The information displayed is wrong. First, there is no mini, small or medium models in Monster speakers. The SoundStage models are S1, S2 and S3. This one, named as "mini", I guess (guided by the picture) it's referred to the S1 and its measurements are 11.50" x 4.88" x 3.50" and this one 16.00" x 7.5" x 4" are the measures of the S3
customer_reviews.author: Josef MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: My S3 sounded great... UNTIL IT STOPPED POWERING ON A YEAR AFTER I PURCHSED IT. Monster "customer service" was no help at all -- I called on 2 different occasions, provided info they had asked for, and was told I would be hearing from someone shortly. Guess what... I didn't hear from someone shortly -- or AT ALL! I am amazed that a company with such a reputation for making high quality products can care so little about customers! BEWARE...
customer_reviews.author: ANGELO SANTILLI

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great for the relative small size of the unit
customer_reviews.text: 1. Sounds great for the relative small size of the unit. Got 2 of these. 2. We easily able to get the set up going and am using the app...the grouping and volume control are great. 3. Best thing for me is being able to play my Spotify Playlist and leave the house to run errands. Unlike AirPlay and BT, my iPhone can leave because SoundStage is streaming from cloud. 4. Because you can connect with mini jack, WiFi, toslink, or Bluetooth, my wife hijacks the bedroom speaker and connects with Bluetooth...she doesn't want to deal with the app. 5. Now with in had more for other parts of the house.
customer_reviews.author: MJY

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend loves this thing!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit for my girlfriend to give her a small sound system to listen to in her apartment. We both were blown away with the huge amount of sound that came from it. Originally she just wanted to connect her phone to it with blue tooth, but discovered that she could connect her Spotify directly and It immediately became her most used gift from me. I'm sold, and will probably be buying another one for my place soon.
customer_reviews.author: YurBoss

customer_reviews.title: Controls are difficult
customer_reviews.text: I've given up on this unit. The small LED controls along the top are difficult to see and use. They are designed to function upon touch. Good luck with that. Sometimes one touch. Sometimes 8-10 touches. Sometimes not at all. Line of sight if it is used on your nightstand doesn't allow you to see the controls at all. I've used it with great aggravation for a year, but giving up and will try to sell it online.
customer_reviews.author: R. Keesecker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Larger version will no longer pair with my iPhone (or another device I own). It had a nice sound while it lasted. Will not be purchasing another (or any product by this company). Buyer beware. I wish I could give it no stars. JP
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too young to die!! R.I.P. S3
customer_reviews.text: Same experience as some other reviewers, sound was okay for listening to digital music, but problems turning it on from the start. How did this design get past the final design stage. Now the S3 won't run on at all, despite light usage, so a huge waste of money. Avoid at all cost if you're looking for something that will last
customer_reviews.author: Joe Alexander

customer_reviews.title: The best part is the app allows our guest to join ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Monster S3 networked speaker to put in my living room to complement the S1 and S2 I had purchased. My living room is kind of big and I didn't know if it would do the job with an open ceiling room. To my amazement the S3 exceeded my expectations. Now when we entertain we can have music in every room in the house from the same device. The best part is the app allows our guest to join in to make play list and it is fun to have access to everyone's music. Buying all 3 Monster S series speakers made adding speakers easy.
customer_reviews.author: RaiNell G.

customer_reviews.title: the S1 goes nicely in my son's room
customer_reviews.text: I have the S2 in my bedroom but wanted a bigger speaker to fill my family room. We have very high ceilings and i was impressed that this speaker filled the room. We now have 3 speakers in the house. the S1 goes nicely in my son's room,S2 for our bedroom and the S3 for our family room. We had a party not to long ago and received a lot of compliments for how clear and how powerful the sound was. The guests also liked the looks of the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this speaker! Sound quality isn't bad but the speaker is difficult to power on. Customer service is aware of the issue and told me to lick my finger and press hard since it picks up the heat from your finger. I don't think I should have to lick my finger for a $200 product to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Short Life
customer_reviews.text: Same as one other reviewer. The red light wont turn on (to blue) and no product support. Expected a much better product from Monster.
customer_reviews.author: user990

customer_reviews.title: Monster S1 is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The Monster S1 is amazing, this small speaker has great sound and fills most any size room. The great thing about the S1 is that I have access to all the music on my network and when someone else gets on my network we have access to each others play list. Great sound at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: RaiNell G.

customer_reviews.title: For a small speaker this speaker sounds great. I bought this speaker because one of my ...
customer_reviews.text: For a small speaker this speaker sounds great. I bought this speaker because one of my friends recommended it and when i received it i was impressed. The manual was easy to read. The speaker was easy to setup and with the App i can share music with my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: This speaker fills an entire room with amazing sound. I started with the S1
customer_reviews.text: This speaker fills an entire room with amazing sound. I started with the S1, then added the S3 for a great multi room experience. Fun to have the same song blasting through the house, or play different songs in different rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plays great, nice sound that fills the room
customer_reviews.text: Plays great,nice sound that fills the room. I use it to stream all my music right from my phones playlist. It can be a little complicated to connect your devices if your not very technical.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: easy to use Bluetooth or wifi
customer_reviews.text: Big sound. Fills up a room, easy to use Bluetooth or wifi. Also use with my tv as sound bar
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound from a very versatile speaker. Can play ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound from a very versatile speaker. Can play Bluetooth or wifi, and it gets loud. App works well, and can directly play my Spotify.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started with he S1 and loved it, added this and now I have music ...
customer_reviews.text: Started with he S1 and loved it, added this and now I have music throughout my house. Super versatile system. Sound quality is off the charts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great family of speakers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great family of speakers. I have my whole house hooked up and the sound is fantastic. App controls each room seamlessly. They play loud, but the clarity remains amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, clarity and layers of songs are incredible
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, clarity and layers of songs are incredible. Also plays very loud. Love the fact it has both Bluetooth and wifi, plus I can use it as a sound bar for my TV
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Monster SoundStage Wireless Home Music System, Bluetooth, Mini
product_meta.description: Size:MiniIdeal for a smaller room, the S1 is part of the Sound Stage High Definition Wireless Home Music System. This is a revolution in multi-room wireless audio, giving you more ways to connect to the music you love, including both Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. Whatever streaming music you desire, Sound Stage can play it, and without a bridge or gateway that other wireless speaker systems require. This is room-filling Pure Monster Sound that takes wireless Hafiz to a whole new level with more clarity, greater dynamics, higher definition, and punchy bass. Control it with your iOS or Android phone or tablet. This changes everything.
feature_bullets: More Ways to Connect - Speaker is both Bluetooth and Wifi, allowing you to stream music regardless of the technology.
No Complicated Bridge Required - Add up to 10 speakers, from up to four streaming music sources, all with no gateway or bridge.
Room-Filling, Location-Free Pure Monster Sound - Get more clarity, greater dynamics, higher definition, and more punch from all your streaming music.

Monster App, Monster Cable, Monster Connectivity - We built an empire on the quality of our cables, and they’re included in these speakers for audio that much better than the rest. Convenient USB charging, a handy 3.5mm mini jack for any source, fiber optic digital for TV, and micro USB for easy software updates are all included. Control it all from via the Monster SoundStage app for your iOS or Android device.

Decor Friendly Design - No more boxy multi-room speakers. SoundStage is easy on the eyes, with a small footprint for easy stash-ability. Exquisite architectural details include leather trim, the soft glow of LED, and a curved blade design that looks good with any décor.
